original_solution_mapping.L1: There are 25 - 5 = <<25-5=20>>20 layers of rock that are not limestone.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Half of those 20 are sandstone, so there are 20 / 2 = <<20/2=10>>10 that are not limestone or sandstone.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Four of those are quartz, so 10 - 4 = <<10-4=6>>6 layers are not limestone, sandstone, or quartz.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Half of the rest are shale, so 6 / 2 = <<6/2=3>>3 kinds of rock remain that make up only one layer in the strata.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 520.
    Returns: the number of kinds of rock that make up only one layer.
    """
    # L1
    total_layers = 25 # 25 different layers of rock
    limestone_layers = 5 # Five of the layers are limestone
    non_limestone_layers = total_layers - limestone_layers

    # L2
    half_divisor = 2 # Half of the rest are sandstone
    non_limestone_sandstone_layers = non_limestone_layers / half_divisor

    # L3
    quartz_layers = 4 # Four of the remaining are quartz
    non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers = non_limestone_sandstone_layers - quartz_layers

    # L4
    shale_half_divisor = 2 # Half of the rest are shale
    single_layer_rocks = non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers / shale_half_divisor

    # FA
    answer = single_layer_rocks
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There are {total_layers} - {limestone_layers} = <<{total_layers}-{limestone_layers}={non_limestone_layers}>>{non_limestone_layers} layers of rock that are not limestone.

Half of those {non_limestone_layers} are sandstone, so there are {non_limestone_layers} / {half_divisor} = <<{non_limestone_layers}/{half_divisor}={non_limestone_sandstone_layers}>>{non_limestone_sandstone_layers} that are not limestone or sandstone.

Four of those are quartz, so {non_limestone_sandstone_layers} - {quartz_layers} = <<{non_limestone_sandstone_layers}-{quartz_layers}={non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers}>>{non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers} layers are not limestone, sandstone, or quartz.

Half of the rest are shale, so {non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers} / {shale_half_divisor} = <<{non_limestone_sandstone_quartz_layers}/{shale_half_divisor}={single_layer_rocks}>>{single_layer_rocks} kinds of rock remain that make up only one layer in the strata.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'half_divisor' (2) was used instead of 'quartz_layers' (4).
